interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: [ 2 Pack] Eyebrow Pencil -Makeup Brow Stylist Definer Longlasting Waterproof Brow Pencil with Spoolie Brush, Shaper and Filler Auto Pencil For Women - All Hair Colors & Skin Tones (A-Brown)
Review Date: 2021/08/12
Store: SZFLWA
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Brand': 'SZFLWA', 'Item Form': 'Gel,Pencil', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting', 'Product Dimensions': '4.72 x 0.79 x 0.2 inches; 0.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '765835047612'}
Review Text: This is a pack of 2 mechanical brow liners in the color brown. These are dual ended pencils so one end has a brow brush while the other end has the eyebrow product. The pencils have a beautiful gold casing that is slim and comfortable to grasp. I think the formula is a little dry so I had to apply some pressure for the desired color payout. The fine tip allows you to draw in precise brow hairs. The staying power is great and held up well throughout my 8+ hour work day. I wanted to test out the waterproof claim so I did shower without washing my face and the color didn't really budge if left untouched. It came off easily using a makeup wipe.
Review Title: Requires some effort for application but stays on pretty well.....
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Glass Spray Bottles 16oz Refillable Container suitable for essential oils, cleaning products, aromatherapy, water mist plants (2 Pack，Blue) RONGCHUANG {'Brand': 'RONGCHUANG', 'Material': 'Glass', 'Capacity': '16 Ounces', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '2.76 x 2.76 x 8.27 inches', 'Product Care Instructions': 'Hand Wash Only', 'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 2.76 x 8.27 inches; 1.36 Pounds', 'UPC': '768253664713'} I got these to replace a bottle of cleaning solution that no longer worked. These bottles are made of glass so they are much sturdier than the typical plastic bottles. The blue glass also looks more "elegant" on a countertop if you plan to display it. There are 2 spray settings (fine mist and stream). I didn't have any issues with leaking. It comes with 2 16 oz bottles, 4 labels, 2 caps, and a funnel (not pictured because I somehow misplaced it already). Looks nice on the counter GERSHION Pastel Gel Nail Polish Set, 6 Colors Gel Polish Set, Soak Off UV Lamp Gel Polish Kit, Nude Pink Yellow Green Color Nail Polish Kit, 7.5ml Gel Polish Kit H-10 GERSHION {'Brand': 'GERSHION', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Color': 'Blue,Green,Pastel,Pink,Purple', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Special Feature': 'Long-lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.5 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Package Dimensions': '4.53 x 3.27 x 3.15 inches; 9.74 Ounces'} This is a great set of 6 bright, pastel colored gel polishes. Each bottle has a sticker on top to mark the color, which is 100% accurate. The polish is on the thicker side so you only need 1-2 coats for opacity. These will be my go to all summer long! Beautiful pastel colors! MISS SPA Head to Toe Body and Facial Mask Set, Brighten Under-Eye, Deep Therapy Lip Mask, Moisturizing Foot Booties, Anti-Aging, Anti-Wrinkle, Skin Care for Women, 3-Pack MISS SPA {'Brand': 'MISS SPA', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening', 'Scent': 'Fresh', 'Skin Type': 'Dry,All Skin Types', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Product Dimensions': '3.07 x 0.24 x 4.33 inches; 2.15 Ounces', 'UPC': '838623303099'} This combo set comes with 3 different “spa” treats: a set of eye patches, feet masks and lip mask. It has a you need to pamper you’re self from head to toe. Here are my 2 cents on each:

Lip mask - it’s big and easily for around my entire mouth. Felt nice and moisturizing on my lips. Leaves you unable to talk for at least 20 min

Feet mask - smells like eucalyptus… nice and cooling on my feet… there are tabs on the side to hold them in place. Feet felt so soft and moisturized after removal. There was no dry spot in sight. I rubbed the rest of the serum all over my legs.

Eye patch - cool and soothing on my face… stays in place even with me moving around freely. Nice combo set Tirtyl Hand Soap Sheet Variety Pack - 240 Pack with Portable Storage Tin - Camping/Outdoor/Travel/Handbag - Lavender & Aloe - Bergamot & Ylang Ylang - Jasmine & Patchouli Tirtyl {'Brand': 'Tirtyl', 'Scent': 'Bergamot,Lavender,Jasmine', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '240.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9.88 x 6.26 x 0.75 inches; 3.21 Ounces'} This set contains 3 packs of soap sheets with the following scents/fragrances: Lavender & Aloe, Bergamot & Ylang Ylang, Jasmine & Patchouli. There are 80 sheets in each pack. The sheets are thin and dissolve easily with water. It provides a good amount of lather and smells wonderful. I used the Jasmine & Patchouli scent today and it's pretty long lasting. My hands felt clean, soft, and moisturized afterwards. This set comes with a storage tin so it's perfect for traveling or camping. Dissolves easily, smells great, and provides a good lather.... [ 2 Pack] Eyebrow Pencil -Makeup Brow Stylist Definer Longlasting Waterproof Brow Pencil with Spoolie Brush, Shaper and Filler Auto Pencil For Women - All Hair Colors & Skin Tones (A-Brown) SZFLWA {'Brand': 'SZFLWA', 'Item Form': 'Gel,Pencil', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting', 'Product Dimensions': '4.72 x 0.79 x 0.2 inches; 0.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '765835047612'} This is a pack of 2 mechanical brow liners in the color brown. These are dual ended pencils so one end has a brow brush while the other end has the eyebrow product. The pencils have a beautiful gold casing that is slim and comfortable to grasp. I think the formula is a little dry so I had to apply some pressure for the desired color payout. The fine tip allows you to draw in precise brow hairs. The staying power is great and held up well throughout my 8+ hour work day. I wanted to test out the waterproof claim so I did shower without washing my face and the color didn't really budge if left untouched. It came off easily using a makeup wipe. Requires some effort for application but stays on pretty well.....
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to favor durable glass containers and is increasingly interested in multifunctional skincare products that offer comprehensive pampering for both body and face. Recent engagement with beauty products indicates a preference for items that provide convenience and quality, especially those suitable for travel.

- **Style & Aesthetics:** The appreciation for stylish items that enhance home decor and self-care routines persists. The user’s choice in cosmetics reflects a commitment to elegance, focusing on stylish yet practical solutions that integrate seamlessly into their beauty and hygiene regimens.

- **Practicality:** There is a growing emphasis on versatility in cosmetics, particularly those that cater to on-the-go lifestyles without sacrificing aesthetic appeal. The user values products that combine functionality with convenience.

- **Quality Consciousness:** The focus on durable, non-toxic materials remains strong, now coupled with an interest in effective makeup solutions that provide long-lasting wear. This aligns with their sustainable product choices.

- **Organizational Traits:** The preference for organized, neatly labeled products extends to makeup, underscoring a desire for accessible and functional cosmetic solutions that maintain aesthetic appeal.

- **User Experience:** The user prioritizes a seamless experience in both personal care and makeup application. While they appreciate effective products, recent choices suggest a willingness to engage with makeup that may require some effort but delivers strong performance.

Overall, the user emphasizes high-quality, stylish, and practical products that enhance their self-care, makeup routines, and everyday convenience.
